name: matchschedules
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool esportapi.
Tool description: ESportApi offers eSports results for League of Legends, Dota 2, Counter-Strike providing also eSports standings and tournament live scores.
For increased rates and more sports, please look at: https://rapidapi.com/fluis.lacasse/api/allsportsapi2/
API description: Fetches the cricket match schedules for a given date, including match timings, teams, and other relevant information.

day.description: The day of the month for which to retrieve the cricket match schedules (1-31).

year.description: The year for which to retrieve the cricket match schedules (e.g., 2022).

month.description: The month for which to retrieve the cricket match schedules (1-12).
